channel.title: [PI] char not found
channel.description:
Base: DSPK Problem: People can't log in after I see this in CMD. Errors(Compiling Errors): None Other Information/Media(Pictures, etc):
Randomly after the server has been up for a while, it starts spamming character file not found, and nobody can log in... How can I fix this?

item.title: [PI] char not found
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

I need a fix for this as well…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] char not found
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Lethal Sir Lethal
item.description:
@Sir_Lethal wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Most likely the deadlock. It has to do with the synchronization in the PlayerSave class.

I would personally say to move away from Project Insanity, as it’s a horrible base to use.[/quote]
I know now that it’s pretty terrible. I had to fix so many things, however my players don’t want me to switch since they’ll lose their shit. How can I fix this so-called “deadlock/synchronization”?

Read full topic
